attributes.action: Stop housing illigal immigrants in hotels army barracks and social housing
attributes.additional_details: Young girls have been subjected to abuse from illigal immigrants housing is in crisis and rishi sunaks now putting our national security at risk let's get signatures for something to be done don't let your country fall any further to its knees don't let illigal immigrants roam our streets harassing young girls don't let illigal immigrants stay in our hotels when we have veterans men and women on the streets sleeping rough while illigal immigrants are in a nice warm bed
attributes.background: Send them home help our own homeless

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for related actions: 

House all asylum seekers who entered the UK illegally in basic accommodation: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/642143

Send all asylum seekers to a third country or their home country: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/640388
